entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: billingMethod

constantValues: Billing method for the project invoice line. Valid values are Time and Material and Fixed Price

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'billingMethod_display' is added to the 'InvoiceProduct' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'billingMethod'
addSupportingAttribute.name: billingMethod_display

members.description: Billing method for the project invoice line. Valid values are Time and Material and Fixed Price

members.name: chargeableAmount

constantValues: The amount from included line details that is chargeable.

members.description: The amount from included line details that is chargeable.

members.name: chargeableAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Chargeable Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Chargeable Amount in base currency.

members.name: complimentaryAmount

constantValues: The amount from included line details that is complimentary and won't be charged.

members.description: The amount from included line details that is complimentary and won't be charged.

members.name: complimentaryAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Complimentary Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Complimentary Amount in base currency.

members.name: contractLine

constantValues: (Deprecated) Shows the project contract line for this invoice line.

members.description: (Deprecated) Shows the project contract line for this invoice line.

members.name: contractLineAmount

constantValues: Amount from the related project contract line if present.

members.description: Amount from the related project contract line if present.

members.name: contractLineAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the project contract line amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the project contract line amount in base currency.

members.name: invoicedTillDate

constantValues: Amount already invoiced to customer for the same project contract line.

members.description: Amount already invoiced to customer for the same project contract line.

members.name: invoicedTillDateBase

constantValues: Value of the Amount Previously Invoiced in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Amount Previously Invoiced in base currency.

members.name: nonChargeableAmount

constantValues: The amount from included line details that is non-chargeable.

members.description: The amount from included line details that is non-chargeable.

members.name: nonChargeableAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Non Chargeable Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Non Chargeable Amount in base currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: project

constantValues: Shows the project for this invoice line.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the project for this invoice line.
